Company: Fresno County, Refined Technologies Inc., DHL
Description of incident: A missing computer disk              contains names, addresses and Social Security numbers. The County sent              it by courier to a software vendor's office in San Jose to determine              workers' eligibility for health care benefits. The software company,              Refined Technologies Inc., said they never received the disk. The courier service, DHL, told County officials that the file was delivered May 10, though the County didn't require anyone to sign for the delivery.
